translations.translation: Have you thought about the water that you drink?
Consider the water that you drink.
Did you cast a good look at the water that you drink?
Have you seen the water which you drink?
So what is your opinion regarding the water that you drink?
Do you not see the water that you drink.
Have you considered the water which you drink?
Have you considered the water you drink?
Have ye observed the water which ye drink?
Have you considered the water that you drink?
Behold! - the water which ye drink:
Have you considered the water that you drink?
See ye the water which ye drink?
Tell Me! The water that you drink.
Have you thought about the water you drink?
Have you seen the water you drink?
And have you seen the water that you drink?
[56:68]   Have you considered the water you drink?
(Have ye) people of Mecca (observed the) pure (water which ye drink) irrigate your fields with and give to your cattle to drink?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱلْمَآءَ } العذاب القراح الفرات السائغ { ٱلَّذِي تَشْرَبُونَ } [الواقعة: 68] وتستروحون نفوسكم به، وتبردون أكبادكم منه؟
